DOC.criteria: spherical equivalent ≤ 4.0 D cylinder ≤ 1.50 D history ocular trauma surgery corneal ocular pathology central corneal thickness < 500 µm scotopic pupil diameter > 6.0 mm abnormality corneal plain elevation topography favor keratoconus ectatic disorder presence systemic disorder collagen vascular disease
